title: The Greek island holding the secret to a long life
text: The island of Ikaria in Greece is a blue zone, an area where people on average live longer and also lead happier lives. Anna Katsas, a young local resident who recently moved in with her grandmother, takes us on a tour of the island, uncovering its secrets from its radioactive thermal water, to its healthy life style practices, to a peculiar philosophy of life, centred around the Greek saying 'siga, siga', meaning 'slowly, slowly'.
